panels.title: Apple Activity Rings

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  --goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
  --total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    active_energy_burned >= active_energy_burned_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet my move goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
--  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
--  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    apple_exercise_time >= apple_exercise_time_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet my exercise goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
--  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
--  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    apple_stand_hours >= apple_stand_hours_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet my stand goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
--  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
--  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    active_energy_burned >= active_energy_burned_goal
  AND
    apple_exercise_time >= apple_exercise_time_goal
  AND 
    apple_stand_hours >= apple_stand_hours_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet all my goals?
Activity & Movement

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Resting"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'BasalEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Active"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'ActiveEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many calories do I burn?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Exercise Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'AppleExerciseTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend exercising?

targets.rawSql:
select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Distance"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'DistanceWalkingRunning'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How far do I run / walk?

options.content:
Dashboard Info


All tiles on this page display the mean of all daily values in the time range selected.

targets.rawSql:
select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Flights Climbed"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'FlightsClimbed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many flights of stairs do I climb?

targets.rawSql:
select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Steps"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'StepCount'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many steps do I take?
Sleeping / Standing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Stand Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'AppleStandTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend standing?

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  count(hk_value) as "# of Hour Stood 1 min"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierAppleStandHour'
AND
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueAppleStandHourStood'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How many hours did I stand for at least 1 minute?

targets.rawSql:
select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date))) as "Time in Bed"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis'
AND 
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much time do I spend in bed?
Body Measurements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'BodyMass'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Lean Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'LeanBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: How much do I weigh?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Fat %"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'BodyFatPercentage'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: What percent of my weight is fat?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "BMI"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'BodyMassIndex'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: What is my BMI?
Vital Signs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', start_date AT TIME ZONE 'MDT') as time,
  min(hk_value),
  avg(hk_value),
  max(hk_value)
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HeartRate'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: What are my heart rate values?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', start_date AT TIME ZONE 'MDT') as time,
  min(hk_value),
  avg(hk_value),
  max(hk_value)
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'OxygenSaturation'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: What is my blood oxygen saturation?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Resting"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'RestingHeartRate'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Walking"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'WalkingHeartRateAverage'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: What is my resting and walking heart rate?
